title: Urf Bans (I think we need more)
body: To be honest there are a lot of overpowered characters in urf and not enough bans to get rid of those impossible to beat urf characters, so I think it's be great to increase the bans available to make up to 5 because of the issue of spammy wammy characters. I mean I hate being able to get 1-shot to someone at level 2 as much as anyone else. Cheers.

replies.body: I think they should implement another function that benefits those champions who are less spammy.

That is the whole point of the mode, you ban those that are highly disruptive.

Hecarim, Sona, Zed, Nidalee should be your main four bans, the other two are for those that you personally struggle to beat.
Spammy champions rule this mode, if you're playing an ADC then you're playing the mode wrong, going glass cannon wont work if you cannot position.
